issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I am trying to add nfc feature in my app. I downloaded this nfc module from the market place of appcelerator. When I try to install the module, it clearly mentions that it does not work for titanium 3.0.2 or later versions. Please help me trying this issue.
fields.summary: NFC Module available in market place of appcelerator does not work for titanium 3.0.2 or later version

comments.body:
Hi,

This site is for reporting Titanium related bugs. You can discuss technical issues in our developer Q/A http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/newest . The NFC module available in the marketplace works for Titanium 3.0.2 or higher on Android. 

Thanks,
